transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Yes sir, abhi baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Haan sir, actually aapne leads review nahi kiya hai IndiaMART pe isliye maine connect kiya hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Aapne buyleads review nahi kiye isliye connect kiya hai maine.
Customer: Karta hu mam, kal karta hu, mai aaj thoda bahar aaya hu, kal karta hu.
Executive: Buyleads se kar lijiye na sir ek do koi bhi.
Customer: Ji nahi.
Executive: Mobile se koi ek do kar lijiye koi. Ji mai gaadi chala raha tha isliye.
Executive: Accha, theek hai, theek hai, to aap pahunch ke call kijiye.
Customer: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not reviewed buyleads on IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive asked the customer to review buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will review buyleads tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, review, call
